Title: Establishes a central business district toll exemption for certain police officers
Summary: Establishes a central business district toll exemption for police officers employed in a police force of a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a central business district toll exemption for certain police officers
